name: Daaang!
description:
Roll your way around and smash anything you see in this physics-based sandbox platformer. No time limits, no objectives, just relaxing smashing fun. Earn money by playing the game and use that money to upgrade stats and special moves.

  • Smash your way through destructible glass, launch off bumpers, pop happy faced balloons, fly off corkscrews and loops, high five cat paw statues, and take out UFOs and more!
  • 5 unlockable ball types, 6 total (Steel, Wood, Tennis, Rock, Glass, Meat) each with their own physics characteristics
  • 3 unlockable special moves for each ball type, 4 total available (Launch, Slam, Brake, Super Jump)
  • 4 movement stats for each ball type with 5-20 levels of upgrades each (Jump count, Jump force, Roll Torque, Movement Force)
  • Unlockable ball skins and unlockable in-game cheats (coming soon)
  • Massive ~1-4 km^2 fantastical and surreal levels (more always coming!)
  • Online multiplayer
  • No in-app purchases, everything offline unlockable by playing the game
